mapper.select: INSERT INTO clip(ingest_id, team_id, folder_id, archive_metadata_id, ingest_at, end_at, convert_metadata_id) VALUES (#{ingest_id}, #{team_id}, #{folder_id}, #{archive_metadata_id}, #{ingest_at}, #{end_at}, #{convert_metadata_id})
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO archive_metadata( clip_uuid, file_path, file_name, file_ext, width, height, format_name, format_long_name, tags, file_duration, file_size) VALUES (#{clip_uuid},#{file_path}, #{file_name}, #{file_ext},#{width}, #{height}, #{format_name}, #{format_long_name}, #{tags}, #{file_duration}, #{file_size})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

INSERT INTO convert_metadata( clip_uuid, file_path, file_name, file_ext, width, height, format_name, format_long_name, tags, file_duration, file_size) VALUES (#{clip_uuid},#{file_path}, #{file_name}, #{file_ext},#{width}, #{height}, #{format_name}, #{format_long_name}, #{tags}, #{file_duration}, #{file_size})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
